overview:
Aaron is a veteran sales professional with over 12 years experience in selling advertising programs to companies ranging from the Fortune 500 to small businesses in every market. Prior to joining Chatterfly, Aaron served as the Vice President of Sales at Brite Media Group, one of the largest non-traditional advertising companies in the out-of-home space. Aaron started his Brite Media career as one of the first employees at Brite Vision Media where he was key in developing growth strategies for both sales and inventory. After building a network of 5,000 independent cafes and selling advertising space within those locations, Brite Vision Media was sold to a private equity firm and Brite Media Group was born. Through several key acquisitions, Brite Media was able to scale its inventory of advertising solutions and create independent networks, which consist of 7,000 independent cafes, 17,000 gas stations, 2,000 check-cashing facilities, and 2,000 Valet Parking companies. Aaron spent his years at Brite Media Group leading the sales charge, developing marketing strategies and executing scalable sales initiatives.

Prior to joining Brite Media Group, Aaron was one of the top sales executives at KNBR 680/1050 and KYCY 93.3. He has spent his career working with small businesses working on marketing strategies designed to bring customers into the store.

Aaron graduated from the University of Colorado with a Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration with an emphasis in Marketing and Advertising.
